Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.alibaba.mobileim.contact.IYWContactProfileCallback
    该接口已废弃，后续请使用IYWCrossContactProfileCallback
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.alibaba.mobileim.tribe.IYWTribeService.accept(IWxCallback, long, String)
    该方法已废弃，后续请使用IYWTribeService.accept(long, IYWContact, IWxCallback)
    com.alibaba.mobileim.conversation.IYWConversationService.addPushListener(IYWPushListener)
    该方法已废弃，后续请使用IYWConversationService.addP2PPushListener(IYWP2PPushListener)和IYWConversationService.addTribePushListener(IYWTribePushListener)

    该方法已废弃，后续请使用IYWTribeService.cancelTribeManager(long, IYWContact, IWxCallback)
    com.alibaba.mobileim.tribe.IYWTribeService.clearTribeSystemMessages(long)
    该方法已废弃，后续请直接使用conversation.getMessageLoader.deleteAllMessage();

    该方法已废弃，后续请使用YWMessageChannel.createImageMessage(String, String, int, int, int, String, YWEnum.SendImageResolutionType)

    该方法已废弃，后续请使用IYWContactService.setCrossContactProfileCallback(IYWCrossContactProfileCallback)

    该方法已废弃，后续请使用IYWTribeService.setTribeManager(IWxCallback, long, String)和IYWTribeService.cancelTribeManager(IWxCallback, long, String)
